And, living up to expectations, Silence Suzuka quickly runs \nthrough and takes the front!
Further, Silence Suzuka doesn't slow down! No, accelerating even \nmore, she increases her lead!
Look at Silence Suzuka go! Now she's passing the 1000m mark!
Just how far will she extend her lead!? How quickly will she \ncross the finish line?!
Silence Suzuka runs in the lead! Now she's heading around behind \nthe big Zelkova tree!
